title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Comprehensive observability with Mobile RUM and Application Map (COP364)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用移动端真实用户监控和应用程序映射实现全面可观测性 (COP364)
abstract: AWS Application Signals connects mobile user experiences to APM insights, providing comprehensive visibility. Application Maps create intuitive visualizations revealing dependencies and bottlenecks across distributed systems. Implement Real User Monitoring (RUM) for iOS and Android to capture metrics like startup times, UI responsiveness, network calls, and crash analytics. Through code examples, learn to instrument mobile applications, correlate frontend experiences with backend performance, and optimize your application stack. Combining mobile RUM with Application Maps creates a powerful observability toolkit delivering actionable insights from user interaction to service performance.
abstract_cn: AWS Application Signals 将移动用户体验与 APM 洞察连接起来，提供全面的可见性。应用程序映射创建直观的可视化，揭示分布式系统中的依赖关系和瓶颈。为 iOS 和 Android 实施真实用户监控 (RUM)，以捕获启动时间、UI 响应性、网络调用和崩溃分析等指标。通过代码示例，学习如何检测移动应用程序，将前端体验与后端性能关联起来，并优化您的应用程序堆栈。将移动 RUM 与应用程序映射相结合，创建一个强大的可观测性工具包，从用户交互到服务性能提供可操作的洞察。
